meanings.definition: To make (meat) tender by pounding or marinating.
meanings.sent1: She tenderized the steak by pounding it with a mallet.
meanings.sent2: The chef tenderized the chicken before grilling it.
meanings.sent3: The meat was so tenderized that it practically melted in your mouth.
meanings.sent4: His words tenderized her heart, making her feel loved and cared for.
meanings.sent5: The marinade tenderized the tough meat, turning it into a delicious dish.

meanings.sent1: The tenderized hug from her friend made her feel warm inside.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's tenderized eyes showed its love for its owner.
meanings.sent3: The tenderized smile on his face brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: Her tenderized words brought comfort to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The tenderized gesture of holding hands showed their deep connection.

meanings.sent1: The old, tenderized rope snapped with the slightest pull.
meanings.sent2: The delicate vase was so tenderized that it shattered when dropped.
meanings.sent3: The tenderized fabric tore easily when caught on a nail.
meanings.sent4: His tenderized heart couldn't bear any more pain.
meanings.sent5: The tenderized leaves crumbled at the lightest touch.
